replies.msg:
Looking for a lovely flatmate (female preferred) to jointly live in a spacious and cozy home - 3 bedrooms, 2 living rooms and 2 bathrooms (794 sq feet)

Bills shared

Location: Tai Wai, close to MTR and bus terminals to TST and Central

Walking distance to markets, restaurants and clinics

Utilities: microwave, washing machine, TV,

Price: $7800/month plus 2-month deposit

Long term rental is preferred
